articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Nigerian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Muhammadu Buhari, president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, on the 57th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would as ever grow stronger.
					
					 It sincerely wished the Nigerian president good health and bigger successes in his work for the social stability of the country, development of its economy and people's wellbeing.

articles.title: Congratulations to Swiss FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Swiss FM
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Ignazio Cassis upon his appointment as foreign minister of Switzerland on September 29.
					 The message wished his success in his new job, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Aged Persons in DPRK Enjoy Int'l Day of Older Persons
articles.content:
Aged Persons in DPRK Enjoy Int'l Day of Older Persons
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The aged people in the DPRK enjoyed cultural and leisure activities on International Day of Older Persons.
					 An art performance of the elderly in Pyongyang City was given at the Central Youth Hall on Sunday.
					
					 Present to enjoy it were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor who is chairman of the C.C., Federation for the Care of the Elderly of Korea, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, couples of former unconverted long-term prisoners, war veterans, meritorious persons and pensioners.
					
					 Staff members of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here and overseas compatriots staying in the homeland were present on invitation.
					
					 Put on the stage were male solo, female solo, dance and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers gave representation of deep thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who put them forward as forerunners of the revolution and takes care of them so that they are full of energy despite the advanced age. 
					
					 Sports and amusement games of the elderly took place at pleasure grounds and parks in the capital city.
					
					 Kind services were given to the elderly to delight them at Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant and other public catering establishments and bases for cultural and leisure activities.
					
					 Such events were held in different parts of the country to congratulate the elderly for their patriotic devotion to the country and posterity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Bangladeshi President
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from MD. Abdul Hamid, president of the People's Republic of Bangladesh, on Sept. 29.
					 The message extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 It sincerely hoped that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger.
					
					 It wholeheartedly wished the Korean people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Over 1.22 Million Women of DPRK Volunteer to Join KPA
articles.content:
Over 1.22 Million Women of DPRK Volunteer to Join KPA
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- All the DPRK women are full of determination to turn out as one in safeguarding the country.
					 According to an official concerned, over 1.22 million women petitioned to be allowed to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army with a will to wipe out on the earth the U.S. imperialists keen on "totally destroying" the DPRK, and the number of volunteers is on the daily increase.
					
					 In this regard, Jong Ok Sun, a resident in Rangnang District of Pyongyang who volunteered for service in the army, told KCNA:
					
					 After occupying south Korea over 70 years ago, the U.S. imperialists have remained unchanged in their war drills against the DPRK and desperate moves to isolate and stifle it, not content with plunging the whole Korean nation into a holocaust of the Korean war.
					
					 The prevailing situation makes me keenly realize the ultimate goal of the U.S. imperialists is to totally destroy not only the territory, property, ideology and system of the DPRK but also all its peace-loving people.
					
					 I am very eager to mercilessly shoot to death all those U.S. mad dogs running amuck to harm my happy family and lovely children.
					
					 Kim Hye Gyong, a resident in Nampho City, said:
					
					 Two years ago, I gave a birth to triplets at Pyongyang Maternity Hospital. Seeing my triplets growing up healthily thanks to the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state, I have refreshed my will to devote myself to our blessed socialist country.
					
					 It is my only faith to do my best in defending my country as a proud mother.

articles.title: Art Performance Given in Hamhung of DPRK
articles.content:
Art Performance Given in Hamhung of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe gave their music and dance performance in Hamhung City of South Hamgyong Province from Sept. 24 to 30.
					 Enjoying the performance were working citizens of different walks of life and youth and students in the province.
					
					 In male solo and chorus "Song Dedicated to the Motherly Party", orchestra and male chorus "We'll Travel One Road Forever" and other numbers, the artistes of the State Merited Chorus sang loudly of the Korean army and people's trust in the Workers' Party of Korea and their faith and will to always advance along the road of the revolution under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 The artistes of the Moranbong Band represented light music and serial songs "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care," female solo "We Call You Father," light music "Pyongyang Is Best", female chorus "Song of Big Fish Haul" and other numbers to impressively show the delight and optimism of the Korean people who are glorifying their dignity as independent people enjoying a worthwhile life under the care of the Party.
					
					 The Wangjaesan Art Troupe performed such numbers as dance "Dash toward Future" and tap dance "Young Days" which represent the stirring reality of the DPRK dashing toward the rosy future.
					
					 The performance won high accolade of the audience.
					
					 All the audiences praised the performance as pulsating one that hardens their optimism and confidence in the final victory in the standoff with the U.S. and the building of a socialist power and as a revolutionary one that turned the flames of Hamnam into the torch of great advance for effecting upswing in Mallima speed.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flails U.S. War Provocation Frenzy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flails U.S. War Provocation Frenzy
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently staged a "combined drill for infiltrating into enemy camp" targeting the rear of the DPRK by mobilizing the U.S. marines and the south Korean marine corps. It also staged a live-shell firing drill in the areas along the western coast of south Korea with the troops of its 8th army in south Korea after introducing the artillery forces from the mainland. A B-1B strategic bomber that took off the U.S. forces base on Guam flew into the northern tip of the Demilitarized Zone, being escorted by F-15C of Japan Air "Self-Defense Force", thus further escalating the tension.
					 Commenting on the facts, Minju Joson Sunday brands this as a prelude to invasion as the U.S. military confrontation racket is a planned and deliberate provocation to put into practice Trump's ambition to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is inching close to the point of explosion due to the U.S. frenzy for confrontation with the DPRK which has become undisguised in a phased manner.
					
					 A war is by no means a game.
					
					 The U.S. will be made to own full responsibility in case the situation turns out to be uncontrollably horrible and disastrous beyond imagination.
					
					 The U.S. should not run amuck, clearly understanding the revolutionary stamina and the strong will of the DPRK which does whatever it is determined to do.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Patriotism leader Kim Jong Il applied to his practice is the most vivid expression of his love for the country, says Rodong Sinmun's Sunday article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Patriotism the Korean people should now cherish and strictly apply to their practice is Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a peerless patriot who valued and took care of every blade of grass and tree of the country.
					
					 He, out of his unshakable creed that strong arms of the revolution preserve the independence and dignity of the country and the nation and guarantee the victory of the revolutionary cause, always found himself on the forefront for defending the country and took the death-defying thorny path for his long journey of Songun leadership.
					
					 His forced marches in snowy storms and scorching hot days and at midnight tell about how devotedly he worked for realizing the ideal of building a power.
					
					 A new great revolutionary upsurge and the hot wind of the industrial revolution in the new century swept the whole country to lay a solid foundation for building an economic giant and sci-tech power. Monumental edifices were successfully built for the prosperity of the country and happiness of posterity. They were all valuable fruitions of his tireless work.
					
					 Wherever one works or whatever one does, if one dedicates himself to the country by cherishing Kim Jong Il's patriotism to tangibly contribute to building a socialist power, that means genuine patriotism.

articles.title: Only Death Awaits Confrontation Maniacs: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Only Death Awaits Confrontation Maniacs: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The American war maniacs hell-bent on the moves to stifle the DPRK are bluffing after presenting a "plan for military counteraction" against the DPRK.
					In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article:
					
					The military confrontation racket of the U.S. against the DPRK is nothing but desperate efforts of the cravens who were astonished by the great advance of Juche Korea and hysteria of those on deathbed.
					
					The U.S. is busy with military confrontation in the wake of the DPRK's complete success in the test of ICBM-ready H-bomb.
					
					A series of the toughest military countermeasures of the DPRK against the aggressive moves of the U.S. clearly demonstrated the tremendous might of the DPRK capable of smashing any provocation of the hostile forces at a blow.
					
					The U.S. mainland is at stake and its nuclear umbrella has become useless.
					
					What is ridiculous is that the south Korean puppet forces are recklessly running amuck, buoyed by the remarks of Trump.
					
					The U.S. and its puppet forces seized with the ambition to invade the north are digging their own grave of their own accord, inviting a barrage of fire.
					
					Since Trump made the most ferocious declaration of war against the DPRK under the eyes of the world, it is a due self-defensive right for the DPRK to resolutely counter it.
					
					Only corpse and death await the war maniacs.
					
					The military confrontation racket of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces will end with their doom.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Should Be Eliminated: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Should Be Eliminated: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The miserable end of Park Geun Hye in south Korea not only serves as a severe judgment of the public mindset against the traitor but punishment on the conservative group who ran amuck for sycophantic treachery, confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and fascist dictatorship rule with the backing of the worst witch in the world.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday stresses this in an article.
					
					 During its stay in office, the group of traitors turned south Korea into mediaeval fascist dark world and graveyard of people's livelihood and human rights and hyped confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, getting hell-bent on war moves against the north, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Under the shade of such traitorous regime, the conservatives had engaged themselves in all sorts of wrongdoings, enjoying luxury and glory. So, they should be buried with traitor Park as a group of accomplices.
					
					 However, far from drawing a lesson from their poor conditions, they are desperately challenging the aspiration of the people's desire and trying to block the current of history.
					
					 The "Liberal Korea Party" and other conservatives shamefully call for a "correct eradication of deep-rooted evils", claiming that the elimination of evils is "politically-motivated retaliation" and it would "give rise to social issues."
					
					 The puppet conservatives should be eradicated in view of the trend of the times and requirements of the people in south Korea as they are accomplices with traitor Park in thrice-cursed indelible crimes.
					
					 Filth should be clearly buried in time and poisonous herb be rooted up for no consequence.
					
					 Clear eradication of the conservative group, rubbish of the history, is a short-cut to bringing about a new politics, new life and new world and it is just genuine eradication of deep-rooted evils.

articles.title: Korean People Will Certainly Force Japan to Pay for Its Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean People Will Certainly Force Japan to Pay for Its Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday carries an article on the lapse of 107 years since the Japanese imperialists began unprecedented colonial rule over Korea after replacing the sign of "Residency-General in Korea" by the "Government-General in Korea".
					 The "Government-General in Korea" was not only a repressive organ to politically suppress the Korean people but also a brigandish body for economic exploitation to put under Japan's domination the key economic lines of Korea in reliance on military force. It was also a suppression organization to stamp out the national education and national culture of Korea, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The "Government-General in Korea" during the first days of its office set up the military police system in a bid to quench the Korean nation's anti-Japanese awareness and to maintain colonial rule and then enforced hideous medieval horror-ridden military rule.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' vicious moves to completely stamp out the Korean nation with the mobilization of all means and methods had become all the more undisguised along with the expansion of the aggression war and with the approach of their defeat.
					
					 After putting up the deceptive slogan "the Japanese and the Korean are of the same ancestry" and "Japan and Korea are one community", Japan enforced the policy of "making Koreans Japanese subjects". In the end it tried to deprive Korean people of even the mother tongue and names. A great number of young and middle-aged Koreans were taken to aggression war battle fields for forced labor and conscription and 200 000 Korean women were forced into sexual slavery.
					
					 Far from frankly admitting and repenting of their past crimes, the Japanese reactionaries are still denying the stark historical facts and justifying them in a bid to evade the responsibility. The Korean people will certainly wrest all prices of the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists and those committed by the Japanese reactionaries.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Denounced for Supporting Trump's Anti-DPRK Outburst
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Denounced for Supporting Trump's Anti-DPRK Outburst 
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive went so foolish as to support the reckless outburst made by U.S. old gangster Trump against the DPRK, thus further touching off the indignation of the Korean people. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean chief executive flew to the U.S. to take part in the UN General Assembly. At "summit talks" with his U.S. and Japanese masters he brown-nosed them, "highly praising" the anti-DPRK remarks made by Trump. He even flattered Trump, claiming that his remarks will "prove highly effective".
					
					 This is a traitorous act of infringing upon the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and supporting the U.S. imperialist war mastermind's declaration of war aimed at plunging the Korean nation into a nuclear holocaust.
					
					 By applauding Trump's dangerous bellicose outbursts and kicking up the confrontation racket, the south Korean chief executive disclosed his true nature as a hideous warmonger.
					
					 If a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula, south Korea will be showered with fire of punishment beyond imagination.
					
					 But the south Korean puppet forces are dancing to the tune of their master's war hysteria, being unaware of their impending death. It is truly ridiculous.
					
					 The puppet forces should behave with discretion, clearly understanding the enraged army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Shameful Attitude Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Shameful Attitude Flailed
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People on September 29 posted an editorial to condemn traitor Lee Myung Bak for totally denying his criminal acts.
					 Recalling that the traitor posted on internet homepage an article denying his crimes at a time when illegal actions including politicking in the period of his regime are disclosed one after another, the editorial said this is reminiscent of a thief crying "stop thief!"
					
					 It calls for legal action against him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Hungarian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Hungarian Paper
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Hungarian newspaper Szabadsag carried leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" on Sept. 25 to mark the 20th anniversary of his election as general secretary of the WPK and its 72nd founding anniversary.
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviewed with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which hewed out a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicated the road of developing the party into his party forever.

articles.title: Trump's Invective Flailed by DR Congo Organizations
articles.content:
Trump's Invective Flailed by DR Congo Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A rally took place in DR Congo on Sept. 24 to denounce the crazy remarks of Trump calling for "total destruction" of the DPRK.
					 Attending it were personages of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo and the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association and other people.
					
					 A statement was read out at the rally. 
					
					 Noting that the U.S. president's address at the UN General Assembly has stunned the whole world, the statement said:
					
					 His inhumane remarks that he would totally destroy a peaceful sovereign state at the UN, the world's largest official diplomatic stage, revealed his true colors as war maniac.
					
					 This proved once again that it is entirely just that the DPRK has taken self-defensive measures to build up the nuclear deterrent in every way despite the hostile forces' escalating sanctions and pressure. 
					
					 The U.S. is groundlessly calling a sovereign state as "rogue state". Then, what can we call this shameless country?
					
					 We contend that heads of state of international community should solve the issue of the Korean peninsula in conformity with the UN Charter and international justice, not through criminal and inhumane methods of smothering a sovereign state's economy and bringing down its social system.
					
					 We, together with the world progressive people who love justice and peace, fully support the self-defensive measures of the DPRK to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the regional peace and security.

articles.title: Indonesians Urge Repeal of U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Indonesians Urge Repeal of U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Personages of Indonesia on September 26 issued statements in denunciation of the hysteric remarks of the U.S. chief executive calling for "total destruction" of the DPRK and its people, an unprecedented declaration of war.
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, said:
					
					 Trump, in his maiden address at the UN General Assembly, blared that he would "totally destroy" the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 His reckless remarks at a time when the tension of the Korean peninsula reached to its maximum are an intensive expression of the U.S. deep-rooted hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We express firm solidarity with the just struggle of the Korean people to defend their country's sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					 The manager of Millennia Armada Express Co. of Indonesia said that the invective of Trump, devoid of elementary diplomatic usage, stunned the world and enraged the Korean people and the world's progressive mankind.
					
					 Trump's violent remarks at the world's largest official diplomatic forum cannot be interpreted otherwise than inhuman declaration of war, the manager said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. should ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its reckless military moves to stifle the DPRK and should withdraw its anachronistic hostile policy.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita el dia de independencia de Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita el dia de independencia de Nigeria
Pyongyang, primero de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este domingo un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari, con motivo del 57o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais africano.
					Convencido de que se desarrollaran sin parar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises, el remitente formulo sinceros votos por la buena salud del destinatario y por mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades para la estabilidad social y desarrollo economico del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Ancianos coreanos celebran su dia con mucha alegria
articles.content:
Ancianos coreanos celebran su dia con mucha alegria
Pyongyang, primero de octubre (ACNC) -- Los ancianos coreanos acogieron el Dia Internacional de Ancianos con diferentes actividades culturales.
					Tuvo lugar este domingo en la Casa Central de la Juventud la funcion artistica de los ancianos capitalinos.
					
					La vieron Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, O Su Yong, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Jong Yong Su, ministro del Trabajo y presidente del CC de la Federacion de Proteccion de los Ancianos de Corea, Cha Hui Rim, presidente del Comite Popular de la Cuidad de Pyongyang, los matrimonios de los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados, los veteranos de guerra, los benemeritos y los ancianos.
					
					A la ocasion fueron invitados los miembros de las representaciones diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales en Corea y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar que se encuentran de visita a la patria.
					
					Se presentaron en la escena el solo masculino, el femenino, la danza, el solo de Jangsaenap (flauta coreana) y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes expresaron el agradecimiento sincero al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quien dispensa grandes favores a los ancianos presentandolos como precursores de la revolucion.
					
					El ambiente de funcion se torno mas placentero cuando los ancianos bailaron al son de las canciones "Changsong de hoy", "Que se vaya el tiempo", etc.
					
					Entre tanto, se realizaron en los jardines de recreo y parques las competencias deportivas y de recreo.
					
					El Restaurante Okryu, el Chongryu, el Publico Hyangmanru y otros lugares multiplicaron la alegria de los ancianos con sus servicios amables.
					
					Este dia, tuvieron lugar en distintas localidades del pais las actividades para felicitar a la poblacion vieja que ha trabajado con patriotismo y fidelidad por la patria y las generaciones venideras.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente de Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente de Bangladesh
Pyongyang, primero de octubre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el 29 de septiembre el Presidente de la Republica Popular de Bangladesh, MD. Abdul Hamid.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia
					
					Me complace enviar las mas cordiales felicitaciones a Vd. y al pueblo de la RPDC que festejan el dia de fundacion de la RPDC.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon que se consoliden en el futuro las relaciones entre nuestros dos paises.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para formular sinceros votos por el progreso y la prosperidad del pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Su Excelencia, reciba el testimonio de mi alta consideracion.
